snippet: The sales of three giants of the old-media world — The Washington Post, The Boston Globe and Newsweek — in as many days suggest one kind of change, but their prices suggest another.
abstract: Sales of three giants of the old-media world--The Washington Post, The Boston Globe and Newsweek--were at prices a fraction of the properties' former value; Tumblr's $1.1 billion sale suggests market believes that its model is way of the future.
lead_paragraph: The sales of three giants of the old-media world — The Washington Post, The Boston Globe and Newsweek — in as many days suggest one kind of change, but their prices suggest another.

headline.main: The New Math of Media Deals
headline.print_headline: The New Math of Media Deals
